Title: Thunderbirds
Author: Peter Hewitt  William Osborne  Michael McCullers

Replies.Reply: Animated scenes of the Thunderbirds on various rescues begin to play as some of the cast and crew names show up.

From a secret island in the South Pacific, the courageous Tracy family run an organization called International Rescue. When disaster strikes, anywhere in the world, they are always first on the scene. They go by the name they gave their incredible machines, the Thunderbirds.
Five, four, three, two, one. Thunderbirds are go!
Replies.Didascalie: (Counts down numbers and shows corresponding Thunderbirds)

Replies.Reply: How kind of you to come back from outer space, Alan. I trust re-entry wasn't too rough?
Here on Earth we've been discussing the Pythagorean theorem. Did any of that happen to sink in?
Replies.Didascalie: (Chuckles sarcastically and continues sounding even more annoyed)

Replies.Reply: You gotta be more careful Alan.
Because technically you're not a Thunderbirds yet. And if your identity was discovered, it would a d-d-di- it could be very bad.

This room's murder with my allergies.

It's gonna make this thing hard to control you know.
